title: Safety and Efficacy of CardioFlow-7 in Severe Hypertension
results_summary: Primary endpoint met. Significant reduction in systolic BP vs placebo. Mild dizziness reported in 5% of subjects.

title: Exploratory Study of CardioFlow-7 for Migraine Prevention
results_summary: Unexpected reduction in migraine frequency observed in hypertensive patients. Further investigation recommended.

title: CardioFlow-7 in Pediatric Hypertension
results_summary: Study terminated early due to poor enrollment. No safety concerns identified.

title: Efficacy of NeuroZ-12 in Refractory Epilepsy
results_summary: Highly effective in reducing seizure frequency (45% reduction). FDA approved for adjunctive therapy.

title: NeuroZ-12 for Management of Diabetic Neuropathy Pain
results_summary: Significant pain reduction scores on VAS scale compared to placebo. Side effect profile acceptable.

title: Study of NeuroZ-12 in Generalized Anxiety Disorder
Dosing Study of NeuroZ-12 in Elderly Patients
results_summary: Pharmacokinetics indicate lower clearance in elderly. Dose adjustment required.

title: Immuno-X for Moderate to Severe Rheumatoid Arthritis
results_summary: Standard of care efficacy met. Non-inferior to Humira.

title: Immuno-X in Crohn's Disease Maintenance
results_summary: Interim analysis shows promising mucosal healing rates.

title: Topical Immuno-X for Psoriasis Plaques
results_summary: Suspended due to formulation stability issues. No safety events in patients.

title: Immuno-X for Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)
results_summary: Withdrawn prior to enrollment due to strategic business decision.
